summary: When the overworked and stressed-out White House presidential shrink runs away, the CEA and the FBR scramble to retrieve him before he could be abducted by various competing foreign intelligence services.
cast: James Coburn|Godfrey Cambridge|Severn Darden|Joan Delaney|Pat Harrington Jr.|Barry McGuire|Jill Banner|Eduard Franz|Walter Burke|Will Geer|William Daniels|Joan Darling|Sheldon Collins|Arte Johnson|Martin Horsey|William Beckley|Kathleen Hughes|Walt Davis|John Gunn|Pitt Herbert|Soon-Tek Oh|Dyanne Thorne|Hank Worden|Kirsten York|Stephen Young
keywords: analyst|the white house|psychotronic film|washington monument washington d.c.|downward spiral
title: Demasiados secretos para un hombre solo
